sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"使丢脸，使受耻辱"之意。
means: humble常可和degrade换用，强调降级所带来的耻辱；也多指自卑和感到渺小无能的心理状态。
humiliate ： 指损伤或剥夺自尊感，损坏自尊心，强调蒙受耻辱。
degrade ： 指因过失而受到降级、阶格；也多指因自身的境遇而感到耻辱。
disgrace ： 指降低某人在他人心目中的地位，使其丢脸。

sentence.Network_en: A dishonest action like that will degrade you.
sentence.Network_cn: 像这样不诚实的行为会使你降低身份.

sentence.Network_en: Don't degrade yourself by answering him.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要自贬身分去搭理他.

sentence.Network_en: You degrade yourself when you tell a lie.
sentence.Network_cn: 说谎会贬低自己的身分.

6．材料可降解（Degradable） 是指为了不形成永久垃圾，不可回收利用的包装废弃物要腐化，并通过肥化达到改良土壤的目的。纸  …
(3) 包装的废弃物可以降解腐化(Degradable) 。为了不形成永久垃圾, 不可回收利用的包装废弃物要能分解腐化, 并通过堆肥化处理达到.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French degrader, from ecclesiastical Latin degradare, from de- 'down, away from' + Latin gradus 'step or grade'

entry.tran: 使丢脸;有辱…的人格;降低…的身份
entry.def: Something that degrades someone causes people to have less respect for them.

example.tran: 认为色情作品有辱女性尊严的观念

example.ex: When I asked him if he had ever been to a prostitute he said he wouldn't degrade himself like that.
example.tran: 我问他是否找过妓女时，他说他不会自贬身份去干那种事情。

entry.def: To degrade something means to cause it to get worse.

example.ex: ...the ability to meet human needs indefinitely without degrading the environment.
example.tran: 无限制地满足人类需求而不造成环境退化的能力

entry.def: In science, if a substance degrades or if something degrades it, it changes chemically and decays or separates into different substances.

example.ex: This substance degrades rapidly in the soil.
example.tran: 这种物质在土壤里会迅速降解。

example.ex: ...the ability of these enzymes to degrade cellulose.
example.tran: 这些酶降解纤维素的能力

means.word_mean: 1. reduce the level of land, as by erosion
2. reduce in worth or character, usually verbally;

sentences.sentence: "She tends to put down younger women colleagues"
"His critics took him down after the lecture"

means.word_mean: 3. lower the grade of something; reduce its worth

auth_sentence.content: It doesn't matter that it will not degrade.
auth_sentence.res_content: It doesn't matter that it will not degrade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It doesn't matter that it will not degrade.

auth_sentence.content: They vulgarise and degrade whatever is...sacred to the mind.
auth_sentence.res_content: They vulgarise and degrade whatever is...sacred to the mind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They vulgarise and degrade whatever is...sacred to the mind.

auth_sentence.content: To degrade human-kind to a level with brute beasts.
auth_sentence.res_content: To degrade human-kind to a level with brute beasts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To degrade human-kind to a level with brute beasts.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de向下+grad步,级+ing……的→向下降了→不名誉的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下坡的, 使降级,小看
stems_affixes.word_buile: down向下+grade[n.等级,级别;年级;分数 v.分等,分级]→向下降级
retro向后+grade等级,级别→向后退步

stems_affixes.value_cn: 摄氏温度计[的];百分度[的]
stems_affixes.word_buile: centi百+grade级,度→adj.&n.摄氏温度计[的];百分度[的]
graduate[n.大学毕业生,研究生 v.大学毕业 adj.毕了业的]+ion表名词→n.毕业[典礼];刻度
down向下+grade[n.等级,级别;年级;分数 v.分等,分级]→向下降级
de向下+grade[n.等级,级别;年级;分数 v.分等,分级]→向下降级
retro向后+grade等级,级别→向后退步
up向上+grade[n.等级,级别;年级;分数 v.分等,分级]→向上升级

means.word_mean: 使降级, 使降低身份

sentences.en: Don't degrade yourself by answering him.
sentences.cn: 不要自贬身分去搭理他。

sentences.en: It was very degrading to be punished in front of the whole class.
sentences.cn: 在全班同学面前受罚是非常丢脸的。

jushi.english: Don't degrade yourself by answering him.
jushi.chinese: 不要贬低身份去答理他。

jushi.english: Do you think it degrades a woman to marry a man, not because she loves him, but because he is rich?
jushi.chinese: 一个女人嫁给一个男人,不是因为爱他,而是因为他有钱。你觉得她是堕落吗?

jushi.english: He was degraded from the class.
